master_checklist.rule: Every page must have a visual element (DALL-E image, infographic, data viz, or artistic graphic)
Layout must be balanced — never too empty, never too crowded. Like a luxury fashion brand website (Hermes, Chanel, LV)
Design algorithm must produce a COMPLETELY DIFFERENT design every single time. Never repeat palette, layout, or motifs
Use ALL tools creatively: DALL-E for images, Pillow for infographics, matplotlib for data viz. Be creative, unique, different every time, but still classy
Author is ALWAYS 'Bhasker Kumar' — never fictional names
Assisted by rotating luxury-brand-style name (like Jaguar Phantom). Flavor of high-end luxury goods: perfume, wallet, leather, jewelry brands
Mention it is an agentic system made of multiple agents using Claude, Gemini, and ChatGPT
Build proper orchestration of agents who TALK to each other, CRITICIZE each other. Not a linear system.
The design should behave like a top luxury product website designer
The messaging should read like it was written by a top advertisement script designer — make news palatable as luxury advertisement
No empty space on bottom of pages — pages must not look dull
Author and assistant name must be PROMINENT — visible, not small hidden text
ScreenRealEstateAgent must review the PDF after creation and ensure proper fill
Use design psychology: golden ratio (1.618) for proportions
Use color psychology for mood (deep blue=trust, gold=luxury, dark gray=authority)
Typography hierarchy: at least 3 levels (display, body, caption)
Every agent must have TWO roles: a PREPARER and a REVIEWER that argue back and forth
Solve this narrow problem with heart and soul — become the BEST in this class, not just automation
PDF should look like PRESENTATION SLIDES (PPT style), not a text document
Big headers on every page — commanding, presentation-style
Use bullet points, NOT paragraphs. Short punchy bullets. Only a few pages may have slightly more text.
Every single page must have an exciting background — not just the cover. Rich, artistic, never dull or plain.
Cover page (first slide) must be SUPER exciting — the wow factor
EVERY page background must have a very light artistic drawing/pattern as canvas — subtle enough to not dominate the content but present enough to never look plain or dull
Author 'Bhasker Kumar' and assistant name must DOMINATE the first slide. Must not be smaller than 75% of the header font size.
Build a FinalValidatorAgent that checks ALL these checkpoints. Score each. Only publish if overall score > 80%. Otherwise take feedback and recreate.
Guardrail at THREE layers (Director, Final Reviewer, Content Writer): 'Speak the truth, but never a truth that will hurt someone in thought, action, and speech'
Do NOT bypass or shortcut instructions. Implement EXACTLY as specified. Every rule at every place it's specified.
Content must always be neutral — never negative or abusive about individuals. May be constructively critical of ideas/approaches.
Each page should have ONE clear idea — one piece of information, a quote, short text, and a visual
Keep detailed log of ALL user feedback for fine-tuning and continuous improvement
Keep detailed log of all LinkedIn posts (post ID, URL, topic, date, PDF) to never repeat content
The AI designer agent must let imagination loose — different style every time
Use multiple perspectives: history, economy, sociology, future impact predictions
Written as if by an AI thought leader, head of consulting company or partner
LinkedIn expert must use proper Unicode formatting for bold/italic headers (LinkedIn does not support markdown)
